This summer probably took a year or two from my life PERIOD I think its probably

just bad karma PERIOD But my horoscope told me to stop complaining so I

will PERIOD

First and foremost I want to thank the copy desk Megan Marleigh Nikole

and Jennifer for their hard work over PERIOD I could not have asked for a better

or harderworking group this summer PERIOD

Id also like to thank our photo editor Elizabeth Olivier for my new

nickname  I think it fits rather well PERIOD

This summer has been real and its been fun but it hasnt been real fun PERIOD

Everyone here did their best to make the past two and a half months as

painless as possible PERIOD Good work everyone PERIOD Now smoke em if you got

em PERIOD
